commands: pip install pycampbellcr1000 pandas ndjson json pyserial

units.name: main_query
units.timer:
[Unit]
Description=Run main_query.service every hour and after booting

[Timer]
OnBootSec=5min
OnCalendar=*-*-* *:*:10
Unit=main_query.service

[Install]
WantedBy=timers.target
units.service:
[Unit]
Description=Run main_query.py after an Internet connection is established
Wants= main_query.timer
Conflicts=shutdown.service

[Service]
Type=simple
User=root
ExecStart=python {project_path}/main_query.py
Restart=on-failure
StandardOutput=file:{systemd_reports_path}/main_query.stdout
StandardError=file:{systemd_reports_path}/main_query.stderr

units.name: disable_sleep
units.service:
[Unit]
Description=Disable sleep and power management features

[Service]
Type=oneshot
ExecStart=/bin/bash -c 'echo 0 > /sys/devices/platform/soc/3f980000.usb/buspower; echo 0 > /sys/devices/platform/soc/3f980000.usb/power/control; setterm -blank 0 -powersave off -powerdown 0'
StandardOutput=file:{systemd_reports_path}/disable_sleep.stdout
StandardError=file:{systemd_reports_path}/disable_sleep.stderr

units.name: scheduled_restart
units.timer:
[Unit]
Description=Restart the system every day at 6PM

[Timer]
OnCalendar=*-*-* 18:00:00
Unit=scheduled_restart.service

[Install]
WantedBy=timers.target
units.service:
[Unit]
Description=Restart the system

[Service]
Type=oneshot
ExecStart=/bin/bash -c 'sleep 10 && /sbin/shutdown -r now'
StandardOutput=file:{systemd_reports_path}/scheduled_restart.stdout
StandardError=file:{systemd_reports_path}/scheduled_restart.stderr

units.name: scheduled_shutdown
units.timer:
[Unit]
Description=Shut down the system every day at 6AM

[Timer]
OnCalendar=*-*-* 06:05:00
Unit=scheduled_shutdown.service

[Install]
WantedBy=timers.target
units.service:
[Unit]
Description=Shut down the system

[Service]
Type=oneshot
ExecStart=/bin/bash -c 'sleep 10 && /sbin/shutdown -h now'
StandardOutput=file:{systemd_reports_path}/scheduled_shutdown.stdout
StandardError=file:{systemd_reports_path}/scheduled_shutdown.stderr
